${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AstralProjection.NAME: Astral Projection
${modID}:AstralProjection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MomsBra.NAME: Mom's Bra
${modID}:MomsBra.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Neptunus.NAME: Neptunus
${modID}:Neptunus.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain ${modID}:Nebula, gain !M! more.

${modID}:DeckOfCards.NAME: Deck of Cards
${modID}:DeckOfCards.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

${modID}:HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
${modID}:HolyWater.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your debuffs. NL Gain !B! ${modID}:Tears, !M! Strength, and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LeviathanForm.NAME: Leviathan Form
${modID}:LeviathanForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Evil.
${modID}:LeviathanForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Evil.

${modID}:DeadOnion.NAME: Dead Onion
${modID}:DeadOnion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! ${modID}:Tears. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:LostContact.NAME: Lost Contact
${modID}:LostContact.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! ${modID}:Tears. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Buffer. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Brimstone.NAME: Brimstone
${modID}:Brimstone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Evil. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Godhead.NAME: Godhead
${modID}:Godhead.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! ${modID}:Tears and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:TheNail.NAME: The Nail
${modID}:TheNail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Evil. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:DeepPockets.NAME: Deep Pockets
${modID}:DeepPockets.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlankCard.NAME: Blank Card
${modID}:BlankCard.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card is played twice.
${modID}:BlankCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL This turn, your next card is played twice.

${modID}:GlitchedCrown.NAME: Glitched Crown
${modID}:GlitchedCrown.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TheBible.NAME: The Bible
${modID}:TheBible.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Buffer. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TheBible.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Buffer. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MomsKnife.NAME: Mom's Knife
${modID}:MomsKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Mercurius.NAME: Mercurius
${modID}:Mercurius.DESCRIPTION: Attacks cost 0. NL Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it and gain !M! ${modID}:Nebula.

${modID}:Trisagion.NAME: Trisagion
${modID}:Trisagion.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${modID}:Purity. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Terra.NAME: Terra
${modID}:Terra.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Nebula.

${modID}:GhostPepper.NAME: Ghost Pepper
${modID}:GhostPepper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:SadOnion.NAME: Sad Onion
${modID}:SadOnion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Purgatory.NAME: Purgatory
${modID}:Purgatory.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:DeathsTouch.NAME: Death's Touch
${modID}:DeathsTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:AnimaSola.NAME: Anima Sola
${modID}:AnimaSola.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrokenModem.NAME: Broken Modem
${modID}:BrokenModem.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible and !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SacredHeart.NAME: Sacred Heart
${modID}:SacredHeart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

${modID}:Gimpy.NAME: Gimpy
${modID}:Gimpy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! ${modID}:Tears. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:GnawedLeaf.NAME: Gnawed Leaf
${modID}:GnawedLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Become ${modID}:Entangled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Jupiter.NAME: Jupiter
${modID}:Jupiter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Nebula. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SuperBandage.NAME: Super Bandage
${modID}:SuperBandage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Buffer, !B! Block, and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CrownOfLight.NAME: Crown of Light
${modID}:CrownOfLight.DESCRIPTION: Channel X ${modID}:Purity. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CrownOfLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel X+1 ${modID}:Purity. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SacredOrb.NAME: Sacred Orb
${modID}:SacredOrb.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${modID}:Reroll.
${modID}:SacredOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card and ${modID}:Reroll.

${modID}:BlackCandle.NAME: Black Candle
${modID}:BlackCandle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Evil and 1 Artifact. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Revelation.NAME: Revelation
${modID}:Revelation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! ${modID}:Purity.

${modID}:Mitre.NAME: Mitre
${modID}:Mitre.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Channel 1 ${modID}:Purity.
${modID}:Mitre.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Channel 1 ${modID}:Purity.

${modID}:Sol.NAME: Sol
${modID}:Sol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Nebula and 1 Artifact. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Seraphim.NAME: Seraphim
${modID}:Seraphim.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each Orb you have.
${modID}:Seraphim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each Orb you have.

${modID}:MyShadow.NAME: My Shadow
${modID}:MyShadow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Evil. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Abyss.NAME: Abyss
${modID}:Abyss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Luna.NAME: Luna
${modID}:Luna.DESCRIPTION: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Nebula.

${modID}:HolyLight.NAME: Holy Light
${modID}:HolyLight.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${modID}:Purity. NL Gain !B! ${modID}:Tears. NL Deal !D! damage.
